title: Making tracks
creator_credit: Malcolm Otton, Film Australia, David Muir and Yoram Gross Films
brief_description: A combination of live action photography and animation is used to impress users of off-road vehicles to ride and drive intelligently, so that Australia’s beautiful bushlands and wilderness areas do not suffer.
creator_credit_for_label: Malcolm Otton, Film Australia, David Muir and Yoram Gross Films
